data.name: Don't Starve Together: Merrymaker Belongings Chest
data.detailed_description:
Merrymaker Belongings Chest

Come ye merry ladies and gentlemen and deck out your holiday adventure with the Merrymaker Belongings Chest. Within you will find all you need to spruce up your Winter’s Feast celebration.

Includes
  • Gingerbread Gate
  • Gingerbread Fence
  • Candy Cane
  • Fluffy Deermuffs
  • Festive Fungal Lamp
data.about_the_game:
Merrymaker Belongings Chest

data.short_description: This Merrymaker Chest contains following skin items: Gingerbread Gate, Gingerbread Fence, Candy Cane, Fluffy Deermuffs, Festive Fungal Lamp.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
